{
  "name": "chicken-tracker-v2",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "build": "next build",
    "dev": "next dev -p 3002",
    "lint": "eslint src",
    "start": "next start",
    "migrations:generate": "drizzle-kit generate",
    "push": "node -r esbuild-register src/lib/db/migrate.ts",
    "migrations:drop": "drizzle-kit drop --config=drizzle.config.ts",
    "db:pull": "drizzle-kit introspect --config=drizzle.config.ts",
    "db:push": "dotenv drizzle-kit push",
    "db:studio": "dotenv drizzle-kit studio",
    "db:up": "dotenv drizzle-kit up",
    "db:check": "dotenv drizzle-kit check",
    "update-browserslist": "npx update-browserslist-db@latest"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@clerk/nextjs": "^6.37.3",
    "@hookform/resolvers": "^5.2.2",
    "@neondatabase/serverless": "^1.0.2",
    "@paralleldrive/cuid2": "^3.3.0",
    "@radix-ui/react-accordion": "^1.2.12",
    "@radix-ui/react-dialog": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-icons": "^1.3.2",
    "@radix-ui/react-label": "^2.1.8",
    "@radix-ui/react-popover": "^1.1.15",
    "@radix-ui/react-select": "^2.2.6",
    "@radix-ui/react-slot": "^1.2.4",
    "@radix-ui/react-switch": "^1.2.6",
    "@tanstack/react-query": "^5.90.20",
    "@trpc/client": "^11.9.0",
    "@trpc/next": "^11.9.0",
    "@trpc/react-query": "^11.9.0",
    "@trpc/server": "^11.9.0",
    "@upstash/qstash": "^2.9.0",
    "@vercel/postgres": "^0.10.0",
    "animate.css": "^4.1.1",
    "caniuse-lite": "^1.0.30001718",
    "chart.js": "^4.5.1",
    "class-variance-authority": "^0.7.1",
    "clsx": "^2.1.1",
    "date-fns": "^4.1.0",
    "dayjs": "^1.11.19",
    "drizzle-orm": "^0.45.1",
    "encoding": "^0.1.13",
    "file-saver": "^2.0.5",
    "firebase": "^10.14.1",
    "firebase-admin": "latest",
    "google-auth-library": "^9.15.1",
    "html-to-image": "^1.11.13",
    "motion": "^12.33.0",
    "next": "^16.1.6",
    "nodemailer": "^6.10.1",
    "react": "^19.2.4",
    "react-chartjs-2": "^5.3.1",
    "react-currency-input-field": "^3.10.0",
    "react-day-picker": "^9.13.0",
    "react-dom": "^19.2.4",
    "react-hook-form": "^7.71.1",
    "react-hot-toast": "^2.6.0",
    "react-icons": "^4.12.0",
    "sass": "^1.97.3",
    "sharp": "latest",
    "superjson": "latest",
    "svix": "^1.84.1",
    "tailwind-merge": "latest",
    "tailwindcss-animate": "^1.0.7",
    "undici": "^5.29.0",
    "vaul": "^1.1.2",
    "zod": "^3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/file-saver": "^2.0.7",
    "@types/node": "^25.2.1",
    "@types/react": "^19.2.13",
    "@types/react-dom": "^19.2.3",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^6.21.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^6.21.0",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.24",
    "dotenv": "^17.2.3",
    "dotenv-cli": "^11.0.0",
    "drizzle-kit": "^0.31.8",
    "esbuild": "^0.27.2",
    "esbuild-register": "^3.6.0",
    "eslint": "^8.57.1",
    "eslint-config-next": "15",
    "pg": "^8.18.0",
    "postcss": "^8.5.6",
    "postgres": "^3.4.8",
    "prettier": "^3.8.1",
    "prettier-plugin-tailwindcss": "^0.7.2",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.17",
    "typescript": "^5.8.3"
  },
  "ct3aMetadata": {
    "initVersion": "6.11.4"
  }
}

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "es2017",
    "lib": [
      "dom",
      "dom.iterable",
      "esnext"
    ],
    "allowJs": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "strict": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "noEmit": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "module": "esnext",
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "jsx": "react-jsx",
    "incremental": true,
    "noUncheckedIndexedAccess": true,
    "plugins": [
      {
        "name": "next"
      }
    ],
    "baseUrl": "./",
    "paths": {
      "@components/*": [
        "src/components/*"
      ],
      "@lib/*": [
        "src/lib/*"
      ],
      "@utils/*": [
        "src/utils/*"
      ],
      "@layouts/*": [
        "src/layouts/*"
      ]
    }
  },
  "include": [
    "next-env.d.ts",
    "**/*.ts",
    "**/*.tsx",
    "**/*.cjs",
    "**/*.mjs",
    ".next/types/**/*.ts",
    ".next/dev/types/**/*.ts"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "workstream-*"
  ]
}

Excellent! Now let me compile the comprehensive report. I have all the information needed.

## Comprehensive Project Structure Report

I've thoroughly explored the chicken-tracker-t3 project. Here's the complete breakdown:

### 1. ROOT DIRECTORY CONTENTS

**Key Files:**
- `package.json` - Project dependencies and build scripts
- `tsconfig.json` - TypeScript configuration
- `next.config.mjs` - Next.js configuration
- `drizzle.config.ts` - Drizzle ORM configuration
- `.eslintrc.json` - ESLint configuration
- `tailwind.config.cjs` - Tailwind CSS configuration
- `postcss.config.cjs` - PostCSS configuration
- `.env` - Environment variables (blocked for security)
- `CLAUDE.md` - Development guidance
- `prettier.config.cjs` - Prettier configuration
- `README.md` - Project documentation
- `.gcloudignore` - Google Cloud ignore patterns

**Build & Config:**
- `.next/` - Next.js build output
- `node_modules/` - Dependencies
- `bun.lockb` - Bun lock file (main package manager)
- `tsconfig.tsbuildinfo` - TypeScript build info

**Directories:**
- `.backup-migration/` - Migration backups
- `.claude/` - Claude-specific config
- `logs/` - Application logs
- `prisma/` - Prisma schema (legacy, see below)
- `public/` - Static assets
- `src/` - Source code (main application)
- `gcloud/` - Google Cloud configuration
- `workstream-1/2/3/` - Old archived app copies (excluded from tsconfig)
- `Screen Captures/` - Documentation screenshots

---

### 2. PACKAGE.JSON HIGHLIGHTS

**Version:** 0.1.0 (T3 Stack v6.11.4)

**Key Scripts:**
```
dev          → npm run dev (port 3002)
build        → next build
lint         → eslint src
start        → next start
migrations:generate → drizzle-kit generate
push         → node -r esbuild-register src/lib/db/migrate.ts
db:studio    → Drizzle Studio
db:push      → Push schema to database
db:check     → Check database state
```

**Core Dependencies:**
- **Framework:** Next.js 16.1.6, React 19.2.4, React DOM 19.2.4
- **Authentication:** Clerk 6.37.3 (@clerk/nextjs)
- **Database:** Drizzle ORM 0.45.1, @vercel/postgres 0.10.0, Neon serverless
- **API:** tRPC 11.9.0 (client, server, react-query, next)
- **State:** @tanstack/react-query 5.90.20
- **Forms:** react-hook-form 7.71.1, @hookform/resolvers 5.2.2
- **UI:** Radix UI components (dialog, select, accordion, popover, etc.), Tailwind CSS
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS 3.4.17, SASS 1.97.3
- **Data Viz:** chart.js 4.5.1, react-chartjs-2 5.3.1
- **Utilities:** date-fns 4.1.0, dayjs 1.11.19, zod 3, cuid2 3.3.0, clsx 2.1.1
- **Other:** Firebase 10.14.1, Nodemailer 6.10.1, Svix 1.84.1, sharp (image optimization)

---

### 3. TSCONFIG.JSON

```json
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "es2017",
    "strict": true,
    "jsx": "react-jsx",
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "noUncheckedIndexedAccess": true,
    "incremental": true
  },
  "paths": {
    "@components/*": ["src/components/*"],
    "@lib/*": ["src/lib/*"],
    "@utils/*": ["src/utils/*"],
    "@layouts/*": ["src/layouts/*"]
  },
  "exclude": ["node_modules", "workstream-*"]
}
```

**Path Aliases:** NO `@/` alias - use relative imports for data/services layers

---

### 4. NEXT.CONFIG.MJS

```javascript
{
  reactStrictMode: true,
  images: {
    remotePatterns: [
      { hostname: "firebasestorage.googleapis.com" },
      { hostname: "images.unsplash.com" },
      { hostname: "img.clerk.com" }
    ],
    formats: ["image/avif", "image/webp"]
  },
  transpilePackages: ['scheduler', '@clerk/nextjs', '@clerk/clerk-react', '@clerk/shared'],
  serverExternalPackages: ["@clerk/backend", "firebase-admin"],
  experimental: {
    optimizePackageImports: ['@clerk/nextjs', 'react-icons']
  }
}
```

### 6. DRIZZLE.CONFIG.TS

      },

### 10. ENVIRONMENT FILE PATTERNS

### 11. TRPC ROUTER (_APP.TS)

**File:** `/src/server/trpc/router/_app.ts`

```typescript
import { router } from "../trpc";
import { authRouter } from "./auth";
import { breedsRouter } from "./breeds";
import { expensesRouter } from "./expenses";
import { flocksRouter } from "./flocks";
import { logsRouter } from "./logs";
import { statsRouter } from "./stats";

export const appRouter = router({
  auth: authRouter,
  breeds: breedsRouter,
  expenses: expensesRouter,
  flocks: flocksRouter,
  logs: logsRouter,
  stats: statsRouter,
});

export type AppRouter = typeof appRouter;
```

**6 Main Routers:**
1. **auth** - User authentication
2. **breeds** - Chicken breed management
3. **expenses** - Expense tracking
4. **flocks** - Flock management
5. **logs** - Egg production logs
6. **stats** - Statistics/aggregations

---

## ADDITIONAL KEY FILES CONTENT

### Middleware (`src/middleware.ts`)

Uses Clerk for auth protection:
- **Public Routes:** `/`, API endpoints for eggs/webhooks, sign-in/up
- **Protected:** Everything else via `auth.protect()`

### DB Connection (`src/lib/db/index.ts`)

```typescript
// Uses Vercel Postgres + Drizzle ORM
const db = drizzle(pool, { schema });

// Edge Runtime handling:
// - Edge: SSL connection
// - Node: Pool with max 10, min 2, 5s connection timeout, 10s idle timeout
```

### tRPC Context (`src/server/trpc/context.ts`)

```typescript
export const createContext = async (opts: CreateNextContextOptions) => {
  return await createContextInner({
    auth: getAuth(opts.req),  // Clerk auth
  });
};
```

### tRPC Setup (`src/server/trpc/trpc.ts`)

- **Transformer:** SuperJSON (for complex types)
- **Procedures:**
  - `publicProcedure` - No auth required
  - `protectedProcedure` - Clerk + DB user check (supports linked accounts via primaryClerkId + secondaryClerkId)
- **Middleware:** Validates Clerk user exists in database

### Auth Helper (`src/lib/auth.ts`)

```typescript
export async function currentUsr() {
  const clerkUser = await currentUser();
  // Checks both primaryClerkId and secondaryClerkId (supports linked accounts)
  // Returns merged Clerk + DB user data
}
```

### Hooks (`src/lib/hooks.ts`)

```typescript
export function useUserData() {
  const { isLoaded, isSignedIn, user: clerkUser } = useUser();
  const { data: user, isPending } = trpc.auth.getUser.useQuery(...);
  // Returns: { user, status: 'loading'|'authenticated'|null }
}
```

### tRPC Client (`src/utils/trpc.ts`)

```typescript
export const trpc = createTRPCNext<AppRouter>({
  transformer: superjson,
  config() {
    return {
      links: [
        loggerLink({ enabled: isDev || isError }),
        httpBatchLink({
          transformer: superjson,
          url: `${getBaseUrl()}/api/trpc`,
        }),
      ],
    };
  },
  ssr: false,
});
```

### Schema (`src/lib/db/schema-postgres.ts` - 251 lines)

**Tables (with Drizzle relations):**
- `account` - OAuth provider accounts
- `breed` - Chicken breeds (with flock foreign key)
- `eggLog` - Egg production records
- `expense` - Expense tracking
- And more (Notification, Task, User tables visible in structure)

**All tables prefixed:** `flocknerd_` via `pgTableCreator`

---

## ARCHITECTURE SUMMARY

**Three-Layer Architecture:**
1. **Repository Layer** (`src/data/*.repository.ts`) - Pure data access with Drizzle
2. **Service Layer** (`src/services/*.service.ts`) - Business logic
3. **API Layer:**
   - **tRPC Routers** (`src/server/trpc/router/*.ts`) - Type-safe API
   - **Server Actions** (`src/actions/*.actions.ts`) - Next.js server actions with `revalidatePath`
   - **REST API** (`src/app/api/`) - For Home Assistant integration

**Key Technologies:**
- **Frontend:** Next.js 16 App Router, React 19, Tailwind CSS
- **Database:** PostgreSQL (Vercel Postgres/Neon), Drizzle ORM
- **Authentication:** Clerk (with linked account support)
- **API:** tRPC + React Query
- **State:** React Query (via tRPC)
- **Forms:** React Hook Form + Zod validation
- **UI:** Radix UI + Tailwind

**Special Features:**
- PWA support (next-pwa)

# FlockNerd Mobile App — Implementation Spec

## Status Legend
- [ ] Not started
- [~] In progress
- [x] Complete

---

## Phase 0: Monorepo Conversion
**Goal**: Restructure into Turborepo + bun workspaces without breaking the existing web app.

### Target Structure
```
chicken-tracker-t3/
  turbo.json
  package.json              ← workspace root
  apps/
    web/                    ← existing Next.js app (MOVED from root)
    mobile/                 ← NEW Expo app
  packages/
    api/                    ← shared tRPC AppRouter type + client helpers
    shared/                 ← types, Zod schemas, date-utils, constants
```

### Tasks
- [ ] 0.1 Create root `package.json` (workspace root with `"workspaces"`)
- [ ] 0.2 Create `turbo.json`
- [ ] 0.3 Create `apps/` and `packages/` directories
- [ ] 0.4 Move existing app into `apps/web/` (src, public, prisma, configs, .env)
- [ ] 0.5 Update `apps/web/package.json` — fix name, paths, scripts
- [ ] 0.6 Update `apps/web/tsconfig.json` — fix paths/baseUrl
- [ ] 0.7 Update `apps/web/next.config.mjs` — add transpilePackages for workspace packages
- [ ] 0.8 Update `apps/web/drizzle.config.ts` — fix schema path
- [ ] 0.9 Update `apps/web/tailwind.config.cjs` — fix content paths
- [ ] 0.10 Update all internal imports that use relative paths crossing boundaries
- [ ] 0.11 Update `.gitignore` for monorepo
- [ ] 0.12 Run `bun install` at root
- [ ] 0.13 Verify `bun run build` for web app works
- [ ] 0.14 Verify `bun run dev` for web app works

---

## Phase 1: Shared Packages
**Goal**: Extract shared types, schemas, and utilities for cross-platform use.

### packages/api
- [ ] 1.1 Create `packages/api/package.json`
- [ ] 1.2 Create `packages/api/tsconfig.json`
- [ ] 1.3 Create `packages/api/index.ts` — re-export `AppRouter`, `RouterInputs`, `RouterOutputs`
- [ ] 1.4 Export `createTRPCReact<AppRouter>()` helper

### packages/shared
- [ ] 1.5 Create `packages/shared/package.json`
- [ ] 1.6 Create `packages/shared/tsconfig.json`
- [ ] 1.7 Create `packages/shared/src/types.ts` — User, Flock, Breed, EggLog, Expense, Task, Notification
- [ ] 1.8 Create `packages/shared/src/constants.ts` — design tokens, expense categories
- [ ] 1.9 Create `packages/shared/src/date-utils.ts` — formatDate, timezone helpers
- [ ] 1.10 Create `packages/shared/src/index.ts` — barrel export

---

## Phase 2: Expo App Scaffold
**Goal**: Initialize Expo app with auth, tRPC, and navigation structure.

### 2.1 Initialize
- [ ] 2.1 Create Expo app: `bunx create-expo-app@latest apps/mobile --template tabs`
- [ ] 2.2 Install core dependencies (Clerk, tRPC, react-query, NativeWind, etc.)

### 2.2 Auth + Providers
- [ ] 2.3 Set up Clerk provider in `_layout.tsx` with `expo-secure-store` token cache
- [ ] 2.4 Set up tRPC provider with Clerk Bearer token in headers
- [ ] 2.5 Set up React Query provider

### 2.3 Navigation
- [ ] 2.6 Create navigation structure with Expo Router:
  - `(auth)/sign-in.tsx`, `(auth)/sign-up.tsx`
  - `(app)/(tabs)/_layout.tsx` — Bottom tabs: Home | Logs | Expenses | Settings
  - `(app)/(tabs)/index.tsx` — Flocks list
  - `(app)/(tabs)/logs.tsx`
  - `(app)/(tabs)/expenses.tsx`
  - `(app)/(tabs)/settings.tsx`
  - `(app)/flocks/[flockId]/index.tsx`
  - `(app)/flocks/[flockId]/edit.tsx`

---

## Phase 3: Core Screens
**Goal**: Build main CRUD screens with real tRPC data.

- [ ] 3.1 Flocks List — `FlatList` with flock cards, "Add Flock" FAB
- [ ] 3.2 Flock Detail/Dashboard — stats cards, production chart, expense chart, breeds, tasks
- [ ] 3.3 Charts — `victory-native` production & expense charts with range selectors
- [ ] 3.4 Log Eggs Modal — bottom sheet with date picker, count, breed selector, notes
- [ ] 3.5 Log Expense Modal — bottom sheet with date, amount, category, memo
- [ ] 3.6 Breed Add/Edit — form with image picker + Firebase upload
- [ ] 3.7 All Logs & All Expenses — paginated FlatList with filters

---

## Phase 4: Secondary Screens
- [ ] 4.1 Flock Edit — form + image upload + delete confirmation
- [ ] 4.2 Flock Summary — monthly stats with share capability
- [ ] 4.3 Tasks — today/upcoming toggle, mark complete, recurring
- [ ] 4.4 Notifications — list with mark-as-read, unread badge
- [ ] 4.5 Settings — profile via Clerk `useUser()`
- [ ] 4.6 Breeding Planner — bird profiles, pair manager

---

## Phase 5: Server-Side Changes
**Goal**: Enable mobile app to communicate with existing tRPC backend.

- [ ] 5.1 Add CORS headers to `apps/web/src/app/api/trpc/[trpc]/route.ts`
- [ ] 5.2 Add OPTIONS preflight handler
- [ ] 5.3 Add `/api/trpc` to public routes in middleware (Clerk Bearer token auth)
- [ ] 5.4 Verify `getAuth(req)` works with Bearer tokens from Expo Clerk

---

## Phase 6: Build & Deploy
- [ ] 6.1 Create `eas.json` with dev/preview/production profiles
- [ ] 6.2 Configure env vars (EXPO_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY, EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL)
- [ ] 6.3 Test EAS build for iOS
- [ ] 6.4 Test EAS build for Android
- [ ] 6.5 Set up EAS Update for OTA

---

## Component Mapping (Web → Mobile)

| Web | Mobile |
|-----|--------|
| Radix Dialog / Vaul Drawer | `@gorhom/bottom-sheet` |
| Radix Select | `@react-native-picker/picker` |
| react-day-picker | `@react-native-community/datetimepicker` |
| chart.js | `victory-native` |
| next/image | `expo-image` |
| next/link | Expo Router `Link` |
| react-hot-toast | `burnt` |
| motion | `react-native-reanimated` |
| react-icons | `@expo/vector-icons` |
| Tailwind CSS | NativeWind v4 |

---

```

Tertiary:   #CD7660
Accent1:    #e76f51
Accent2:    #e9c46a
Background: #FEF9F6
```

---

## Files Moved to `apps/web/`
- `src/`, `public/`, `prisma/`, `.env`
- `next.config.mjs`, `tsconfig.json`, `tailwind.config.cjs`, `postcss.config.cjs`
- `drizzle.config.ts`, `.eslintrc.json`, `prettier.config.cjs`
- `components.json`, `next-env.d.ts`, `next-pwa.d.ts`
- `middleware.ts` (stays at src/middleware.ts inside apps/web/)

## Files Staying at Root
- `turbo.json`, root `package.json`, `.gitignore`, `.claude/`, `CLAUDE.md`
- `README.md`, `bun.lockb`
- `.git/`, `.vscode/`

- `README.md`, `bun.lockb`
- `.git/`, `.vscode/`

tool_input.subject: Phase 0: Monorepo conversion (Turborepo + bun workspaces)
tool_input.description: Restructure the project into a Turborepo monorepo with apps/web (existing Next.js) and apps/mobile (new Expo). Create root package.json, turbo.json, move existing app to apps/web/, update all configs and imports.

tool_input.subject: Phase 1: Create shared packages (api + shared)
tool_input.description: Create packages/api (re-exports AppRouter, tRPC helpers) and packages/shared (types, constants, date-utils) for cross-platform use.

tool_input.subject: Phase 2: Expo app scaffold with auth + tRPC + navigation
tool_input.description: Initialize Expo app, set up Clerk auth, tRPC client with Bearer token, navigation structure with Expo Router.

task.subject: Phase 2: Expo app scaffold with auth + tRPC + navigation

tool_input.subject: Phase 5: Server-side CORS + auth changes for mobile
tool_input.description: Add CORS headers and OPTIONS handler to tRPC route. Update middleware to allow Bearer token auth from Expo Clerk.
tool_input.activeForm: Adding CORS and mobile auth support

task.subject: Phase 5: Server-side CORS + auth changes for mobile

tool_input.subject: Phase 3: Core screens (Flocks, Dashboard, Charts, Modals)
tool_input.description: Build main mobile screens: flocks list, flock detail/dashboard, charts, log eggs/expense modals, breed CRUD, paginated lists.

task.subject: Phase 3: Core screens (Flocks, Dashboard, Charts, Modals)

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "es2017",
    "lib": [
      "dom",
      "dom.iterable",
      "esnext"
    ],
    "allowJs": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "strict": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "noEmit": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "module": "esnext",
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "jsx": "react-jsx",
    "incremental": true,
    "noUncheckedIndexedAccess": true,
    "plugins": [
      {
        "name": "next"
      }
    ],
    "baseUrl": "./",
    "paths": {
      "@components/*": [
        "src/components/*"
      ],
      "@lib/*": [
        "src/lib/*"
      ],
      "@utils/*": [
        "src/utils/*"
      ],
      "@layouts/*": [
        "src/layouts/*"
      ]
    }
  },
  "include": [
    "next-env.d.ts",
    "**/*.ts",
    "**/*.tsx",
    "**/*.cjs",
    "**/*.mjs",
    ".next/types/**/*.ts",
    ".next/dev/types/**/*.ts"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "workstream-*"
  ]
}
